title: Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
description: The labels in the Update Test Suite dialog are incorrect.
OB:
1. The label 'Test Classes to be included' is written as 'TestClasses' (missing space).
2. The status line refers to methods being selected instead of types.
3. The action name is written as 'TestSuite' instead of 'Test Suite'.
EB:
1. The label 'Test Classes to be included' should be written as 'Test Classes'.
2. The status line should refer to types being selected instead of methods.
3. The action name should be written as 'Test Suite' instead of 'TestSuite'.
SR:
1. Open the Update Test Suite dialog.
2. Observe the label 'Test Classes to be included'.
3. Observe the status line.
4. Observe the action name.
